testimonials_section.title: Results, Not Promises
testimonials_section.subtitle: We let the charts do the talking.

items.quote: Lumina didn't just 'do marketing.' They engineered a movement. Our TVL went from $0 to $50M in 48 hours.
items.author: Alex V.

items.quote: The SEO strategy was genius. We own every keyword in our niche now. It's an unfair advantage.
items.author: Sarah Chen

items.quote: They turned our dormant loyalty program into a thriving NFT ecosystem. Our engagement is up 400%.
items.author: Marcus J.

items.question: Are you an agency or a tech partner?
items.answer: Both. We believe modern marketing requires engineering. We deploy code as much as we deploy copy. Think of us as Growth Engineers.

items.question: How fast can we see results?
items.answer: In Web3, hours. In Web2 SEO, months. We build a balanced portfolio of 'quick wins' (paid/social) and 'long moats' (brand/SEO) to ensure immediate traction and long-term dominance.

items.question: Do you handle equity/token deals?
items.answer: For select partners with high-conviction protocol design, we are open to hybrid cash/token compensation models. We like to have skin in the game.

items.question: Can you help us pivot from Web2 to Web3?
items.answer: This is our specialty. We identify which parts of your business benefit from decentralization (loyalty, community, settlement) and which should stay centralized. No forced blockchain use cases.

cta_section.title: Ready to Ascend?
cta_section.subtitle: Your competitors are still using ChatGPT for blog posts. We're building autonomous growth engines. Join us.
